sustain.name: Sustain
sustain.desc: Notes carry until next note or rest

isLoop.name: Loop
isLoop.desc: Set playmode to repeat current time depth

isOsc.name: Visual Mode
isOsc.desc: Select from four audio to visual modes; none, spectrograph, multi osciliscope, bar graph

isPaint.name: Paint
isPaint.desc: Toggles replace or append  to current notes

verticalTab.name: Instrument Orientation
verticalTab.desc: Toggle the orientation of the instrument

isMoji.name: Notemoji
isMoji.desc: Toggle emoji as visual representation of note

isToneToHue.name: Doppler Effect
isToneToHue.desc: Colors the notes to match where they fall on the beat

option-panel.name: Option Panel
option-panel.desc: Adjust various song specific attributes; ie. volume, tempo
